name: fhPlayer
short_description:
JavaScript library for generating an HTML5 audio player for your website. Java and Flash can be used as fallbacks in the event that a browser does not support the audio codecs you use. fhPlayer is very kludgy and was only designed to meet personal needs, but has been uploaded in the hopes that someone will find it useful. It is released under the MIT license.

An example of an fhPlayer implementation is the audio player on my website, located at http://dl.dropbox.com/u/63613338/asmallslice/music.html
